page.title: 13Home Life In South Kyme-2
page.content: Regarding furniture, the self- assembly type is at present very popular, being reasonably priced. Three piece suites usually form the basis of the living room (lounge). Most families have fitted carpets. Fitted kitchens, with labour saving devices are typical eg.automatic wash- ing machines, tumble driers, food processors. Microwave ovens are also putting in an appearance. A lot of families own or rent colour televisions, and several homes possess more than one. Children watch much more television these days. Most households do some painting and decorating; do-it-yourself being not only money saving but also a hobby. Dogs and cats are the usual choice for pets, though a few people have other animals eg. goats(for milk), rabbits, rats!, budgies, fish etc.
